name: StreetPass Mii Plaza: Update
synopsis: StreetPass Mii Plaza received an update and five new games are now available! And that's not all - one will be for free! ■ For your free game, you can select one of these two (the other will be available for purchase): - StreetPass Slot Racer - StreetPass Trader ■ These new games are also available for purchase now: - StreetPass Ninja - StreetPass Explorers - StreetPass Chef ■ StreetPass Mii Plaza Premium users can now store up to 100 encounters in a queue at the plaza entrance ■ Some other adjustments have been made to make StreetPass Mii Plaza quicker, especially on New Nintendo 3DS systems.
